line.text: O never say that I was false of heart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Though absence seemed my flame to qualify
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As easy might I from my self depart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As from my soul which in thy breast doth lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That is my home of love if I have ranged
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Like him that travels I return again
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Just to the time not with the time exchanged
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So that my self bring water for my stain
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Never believe though in my nature reigned
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: All frailties that besiege all kinds of blood
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That it could so preposterously be stained
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To leave for nothing all thy sum of good
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For nothing this wide universe I call
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Save thou my rose in it thou art my all
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
